alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lake and northwestern Volusia Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorms near Paisley to Alexander Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... DeLand, Orange City, Lake Helen, Pierson and Barberville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with the storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
